channel.title: Ispdb on UCOSP
channel.description: Recent content in Ispdb on UCOSP

item.title: First Patch Ever.
item.description: First Patch Ever. Once my pending patch has been checked into the source tree, I will become a member of the open source community. It doesn’t look like much but it does fix a problem. I take heart from Richard Feynman who said, ” No problem is too small or too trivial if we can really do something about it.”.Â Here is a few things I learned: Svn needs a better way to manage patches because pending ones causes a mess.
